com.uwsoft.editor.renderer

Class SceneLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uwsoft.editor.renderer.SceneLoader

  • public class SceneLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    SceneLoader is important part of runtime that utilizes provided IResourceRetriever (or creates default one shipped with runtime) in order to load entire scene data into viewable actors provides the functionality to get root actor of scene and load scenes.
